content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to insufficient resources for crafting
- Ensure you have enough raw materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items. Check your inventory regularly to avoid running out of necessary components.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities on the intended placement tile.
